short_summary: Heat, ventilation, air conditioning construction and maintenance services
full_summary:
================================

**Government Tender Announcement**

-------------------------------------------------------

**Reference Number**
------------------

WS3972692139

**Title - English**
-----------------

W6896-23S093 - Mechanical Maintenance at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Shilo

**Title - French**
-----------------

W6896-23S093 - Entretien mécanique à la base des Forces canadiennes Shilo

**Tender Closing Date**
----------------------

14:00:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT) - June 09, 2023

**Background**
--------------

Amendment 2 to the Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) for Mechanical Maintenance Services at CFB Shilo is now available. The contracting entity, the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), is seeking a contractor to provide skilled labour, tools, equipment, transportation, supervision, and materials for Mechanical Maintenance services.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The contractor will be responsible for providing the required Mechanical Maintenance services to the Real Property Operations Unit (West) at CFB Shilo, Manitoba. The services are to be provided on an "as and when required" basis.

**Notice Type**
--------------

Competitive - Open Bidding

**Submission Method**
-------------------

The tender must be submitted electronically through the Ariba Discovery online portal by the tender closing date and time specified above. All required supporting documentation must be uploaded with the tender submission.

**Evaluation Criteria**
----------------------

The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Language of Tender**
-------------------

English and French

**Contracting Entity**
--------------------

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For more information, please contact Eric Kwan at eric.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.-------------------------------------------------------

**Notice URL**
--------------

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16379778?extsite=MTYzNzk3NzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

```
